metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3756 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libmysofa is vulnerable to Heap-based Buffer Overflow

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3756` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysofa-utils - 1.2.1~dfsg0-1
libmysofa1 - 1.2.1~dfsg0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmysofa package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.1~dfsg0-1').
